description: The Mount Hood Meadows Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Mount Hood Meadows for the snow report
Alexa, ask Mount Hood Meadows for latest conditions

name: Snow Report for Mount Hood Meadows
shortDescription: The Mount Hood Meadows Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Mount Hood Meadows.
